question: C. Wright Mills’ The Power Elite (1956) offered a general analysis of elites in?
option2: Developed capitalistic world of North America and Western Europe
option3: Developed capitalistic nations of North America, Western Europe and Japan
explanation: In the view of C. Wright Mills (‘The Power Elite–1956’), however, industrialized societies like the USA are dominated by a ‘power elite’, a small cohesive group that commands ‘the major hierarchies and organizations of modern society’.
